body.p: performs the validation of Ant build files with the help of a built-in processor, which is largely based on the Apache Ant libraries. The path to these libraries can be configured in the page. The validation processor accesses the parameters set in the associated Ant transformation scenario and uses them as Ant properties when validating the current build script.
To validate the Ant build file you are currently editing, press the Validate button in the application toolbar.
